name: 02.quotemachine
description: My solution to the [Zipline: Build a Random Quote Machine](http://www.freecodecamp.com/challenges/zipline-build-a-random-quote-machine) exercise from **FreeCodeCamp**. Simple random cat facts made in HTML5, CSS and Javascript. Live version in [codepen.io](http://codepen.io/pouyio/pen/JYowMb).
